title: Kannukul kannai lyrics vinnaithaandi varuvaaya song lyrics
stanzas:
Other Song lyrics
1. Hosanna lyrics
2. Vinnaithaandi Varuvaayaa  lyrics
3. Vinnaithaandi Varuvaaya tamil lyrics
4. Mannipaaya lyric
5. Kannukul kannai lyrics
6. Anbil avan lyrics
 
Kannukul kannai ootrikonde illai illai endraye
kallam ondrai ulley vaithu paarvai thandhu sendraye
kadhal kondu nan pesa kathi thooki nee vesa
Pakkam vandhu thottu pesum kanavugal kanden
Innum satru aruge vandhu muthamum thandhen
Ithanai nadandhum kadhal illai enbadhum sariya
Anaai nanum pennai neyum iruvarum pilaya

Un nanbanillai naan vanninilla
Un nanbanillai nee en uyirinilla
Un nanbanillai naan vanninilla
Un nanbanillai nee en uyirinilla

kadhal kondu nan pesa kathi thooki nee vesa

Innum satru aruge vandhu muthamum thandhen

Neeyum naanum ore pulli ore kodu
Neeyum naanum vazha pogum andha idam ore veedu
kadhal endral kayam thaan
Abil ododi vandhu enkannai parthu
kadhal thaan endru solli enkayam matru

seo.title: Kannukul kannai lyrics vinnaithaandi varuvaaya song lyrics
seo.description: Get the complete Kannukul kannai lyrics vinnaithaandi varuvaaya song lyrics from Vinnaithaandi Varuvaaaya. Read the lyrics penned by Thamarai and composed by AR Rahman and sung by Naresh Iyer. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Thamarai, Vinnaithaandi Varuvaaaya, AR Rahman, Naresh Iyer, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
